post.subject: "Wisdom's Measure" Sethos is here! Take part in the event for a guaranteed reward!
post.content: Olah! Hello, Travelers~ The friend I will be introducing today, whose title is "Wisdom's Measure," is none other than the Desert Envoy himself — Sethos! He has a great sense of direction, knows the paths to the desert's oases like the back of his hand, and is enthusiastic and talkative. With him as your travel guide, not only will you learn a lot, but you'll have loads of fun too~ In short, his personality is the type this particular hilichurl likes too. It's no wonder that everywhere he goes, from the desert to the rainforest, he has friends to talk to. Do you have any stories about helping others or being helped by others of your own? Come share them with me! (*^▽^*)~

post.subject: Primogem Rewards: Teyvat Sports Contest Now Open!
post.content: Olah! Hello, Traveler~ The first Teyvat Sports Contest begins today! Take part in the event for a chance to win up to Primogems ×3,000! Category: Long-Distance Running How to play: 1. Start running from the designated starting points and charge towards the destination as fast as you can! 2. Travelers can freely select their party composition and route. You can also invite friends to complete the challenge in Co-Op Mode! 3. Note: You can't use Teleport Waypoints to cheat during the contest~ 4. Out of the two maps below, Travelers can choose a map that they are more familiar with to participate in the contest~

post.subject: The "Iridescence Tour" Interaction Platform is available for a limited time! Discuss and share beautiful music on this platform!
post.content: Traveler, the passionate and wild Fontaine music festival "Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness" is being held on Watatsumi Island! Apart from taking part in exciting events such as the Xtreme Carnival Ensemble, you can also create your own musical compositions and show off your rock 'n' roll spirit! At the same time, the "Iridescence Tour" Interaction Platform is available for a limited time. You can present your own custom music scores by uploading videos and images of your scores to the platform. You can also view other creators' scores and select your favorite scores to challenge them in-game. You can even upload the recordings of your challenges! Rock 'n' roll for life! Showcase your wonderful imagination and exchange composition inspirations!

post.subject: "Leonine Vanguard" Gaming Is Here! Take Part in the Event for a Guaranteed Reward!
post.content: Olah! Hello, Travelers~ Today, we will be introducing Gaming, Guard of the "Sword and Strongbox Secure Transport Agency" and head of the "Mighty Mythical Beasts" Wushou troupe. As a guard, the task of escorting goods from Yilong Wharf to Liyue Harbor couldn't be easier for Gaming. But as the head of the "Mighty Mythical Beasts," his dream of making the Wushou Dance a regular occurrence in Liyue Harbor still has a long, long road ahead of it... I've witnessed Gaming wearing his Wushou head before, and it really felt like a Suanni had appeared! The way that the Wushou head glows... that must be elemental energy, right? It's so special!
